00025 #ifndef _PASSENGER_CONFIGURATION_H_
00026 #define _PASSENGER_CONFIGURATION_H_

00031 /* The APR headers must come after the Passenger headers. See Hooks.cpp
00032  * to learn why.
00033  *
00034  * MessageChannel.h must be included -- even though we don't actually use
00035  * MessageChannel.h in here, it's necessary to make sure that apr_want.h
00036  * doesn't b0rk on 'struct iovec'.
00037  */
00038 #include <apr_pools.h>
00039 #include <httpd.h>
00040 #include <http_config.h>

00043  * @defgroup Configuration Apache module configuration

00048 /** Module version number. */
00049 #define PASSENGER_VERSION "2.2.0"

00051 #ifdef __cplusplus
00052         #include <set>
00053         #include <string>
00054 
00055         namespace Passenger {
00056         
00057                 using namespace std;
00058                 
00059                 /**
00060                  * Per-directory configuration information.
00061                  *
00062                  * Use the getter methods to query information, because those will return
00063                  * the default value if the value is not specified.
00064                  */
00065                 struct DirConfig {
00066                         enum Threeway { ENABLED, DISABLED, UNSET };
00067                         enum SpawnMethod { SM_UNSET, SM_SMART, SM_SMART_LV2, SM_CONSERVATIVE };
00068                         
00069                         Threeway enabled;
00070                         
00071                         std::set<std::string> railsBaseURIs;
00072                         std::set<std::string> rackBaseURIs;
00073                         
00074                         /** Whether to autodetect Rails applications. */
00075                         Threeway autoDetectRails;
00076                         
00077                         /** Whether to autodetect Rack applications. */
00078                         Threeway autoDetectRack;
00079                         
00080                         /** Whether to autodetect WSGI applications. */
00081                         Threeway autoDetectWSGI;
00082                         
00083                         /** Whether mod_rewrite should be allowed for Rails applications. */
00084                         Threeway allowModRewrite;
00085                         
00086                         /** The environment (i.e. value for RAILS_ENV) under which
00087                          * Rails applications should operate. */
00088                         const char *railsEnv;
00089                         
00090                         /** The path to the application's root (for example: RAILS_ROOT
00091                          * for Rails applications, directory containing 'config.ru'
00092                          * for Rack applications). If this value is NULL, the default
00093                          * autodetected path will be used.
00094                          */
00095                         const char *appRoot;
00096                         
00097                         /** The environment (i.e. value for RACK_ENV) under which
00098                          * Rack applications should operate. */
00099                         const char *rackEnv;
00100                         
00101                         /** The Rails spawn method to use. */
00102                         SpawnMethod spawnMethod;
00103                         
00104                         /**
00105                          * The idle timeout, in seconds, of Rails framework spawners.
00106                          * May also be 0 (which indicates that the framework spawner should
00107                          * never idle timeout) or -1 (which means that the value is not specified).
00108                          */
00109                         long frameworkSpawnerTimeout;
00110                         
00111                         /**
00112                          * The idle timeout, in seconds, of Rails application spawners.
00113                          * May also be 0 (which indicates that the application spawner should
00114                          * never idle timeout) or -1 (which means that the value is not specified).
00115                          */
00116                         long appSpawnerTimeout;
00117                         
00118                         /**
00119                          * The maximum number of requests that the spawned application may process
00120                          * before exiting. A value of 0 means unlimited.
00121                          */
00122                         unsigned long maxRequests;
00123                         
00124                         /** Indicates whether the maxRequests option was explicitly specified
00125                          * in the directory configuration. */
00126                         bool maxRequestsSpecified;
00127                         
00128                         /**
00129                          * The maximum amount of memory (in MB) the spawned application may use.
00130                          * A value of 0 means unlimited.
00131                          */
00132                         unsigned long memoryLimit;
00133                         
00134                         /** Indicates whether the memoryLimit option was explicitly specified
00135                          * in the directory configuration. */
00136                         bool memoryLimitSpecified;
00137                         
00138                         Threeway highPerformance;
00139                         
00140                         /** Whether global queuing should be used. */
00141                         Threeway useGlobalQueue;
00142                         
00143                         /**
00144                          * Throttle the number of stat() calls on files like
00145                          * restart.txt to the once per given number of seconds.
00146                          */
00147                         unsigned long statThrottleRate;
00148                         
00149                         /** Indicates whether the statThrottleRate option was
00150                          * explicitly specified in the directory configuration. */
00151                         bool statThrottleRateSpecified;
00152                         
00153                         /** The directory in which Passenger should look for
00154                          * restart.txt. NULL means that the default directory
00155                          * should be used.
00156                          */
00157                         const char *restartDir;
00158                         
00159                         /*************************************/
00160                         
00161                         bool isEnabled() const {
00162                                 return enabled != DISABLED;
00163                         }
00164                         
00165                         string getAppRoot(const char *documentRoot) const {
00166                                 if (appRoot == NULL) {
00167                                         return extractDirName(documentRoot);
00168                                 } else {
00169                                         return appRoot;
00170                                 }
00171                         }
00172                         
00173                         string getAppRoot(const string &documentRoot) const {
00174                                 if (appRoot == NULL) {
00175                                         return extractDirName(documentRoot);
00176                                 } else {
00177                                         return appRoot;
00178                                 }
00179                         }
00180                         
00181                         const char *getRailsEnv() const {
00182                                 if (railsEnv != NULL) {
00183                                         return railsEnv;
00184                                 } else {
00185                                         return "production";
00186                                 }
00187                         }
00188                         
00189                         const char *getRackEnv() const {
00190                                 if (rackEnv != NULL) {
00191                                         return rackEnv;
00192                                 } else {
00193                                         return "production";
00194                                 }
00195                         }
00196                         
00197                         const char *getSpawnMethodString() {
00198                                 switch (spawnMethod) {
00199                                 case SM_SMART:
00200                                         return "smart";
00201                                 case SM_SMART_LV2:
00202                                         return "smart-lv2";
00203                                 case SM_CONSERVATIVE:
00204                                         return "conservative";
00205                                 default:
00206                                         return "smart-lv2";
00207                                 }
00208                         }
00209                         
00210                         unsigned long getMaxRequests() {
00211                                 if (maxRequestsSpecified) {
00212                                         return maxRequests;
00213                                 } else {
00214                                         return 0;
00215                                 }
00216                         }
00217                         
00218                         unsigned long getMemoryLimit() {
00219                                 if (memoryLimitSpecified) {
00220                                         return memoryLimit;
00221                                 } else {
00222                                         return 200;
00223                                 }
00224                         }
00225                         
00226                         bool highPerformanceMode() const {
00227                                 return highPerformance == ENABLED;
00228                         }
00229                         
00230                         bool usingGlobalQueue() const {
00231                                 return useGlobalQueue == ENABLED;
00232                         }
00233                         
00234                         unsigned long getStatThrottleRate() const {
00235                                 if (statThrottleRateSpecified) {
00236                                         return statThrottleRate;
00237                                 } else {
00238                                         return 0;
00239                                 }
00240                         }
00241                         
00242                         const char *getRestartDir() const {
00243                                 if (restartDir != NULL) {
00244                                         return restartDir;
00245                                 } else {
00246                                         return "";
00247                                 }
00248                         }
00249                         
00250                         /*************************************/
00251                 };
00252                 
00253                 /**
00254                  * Server-wide (global, not per-virtual host) configuration information.
00255                  *
00256                  * Use the getter methods to query information, because those will return
00257                  * the default value if the value is not specified.
00258                  */
00259                 struct ServerConfig {
00260                         /** The filename of the Ruby interpreter to use. */
00261                         const char *ruby;
00262                         
00263                         /** The Passenger root folder. */
00264                         const char *root;
00265                         
00266                         /** The log verbosity. */
00267                         unsigned int logLevel;
00268                         
00269                         /** The maximum number of simultaneously alive application
00270                          * instances. */
00271                         unsigned int maxPoolSize;
00272                         
00273                         /** Whether the maxPoolSize option was explicitly specified in
00274                          * this server config. */
00275                         bool maxPoolSizeSpecified;
00276                         
00277                         /** The maximum number of simultaneously alive Rails application
00278                          * that a single Rails application may occupy. */
00279                         unsigned int maxInstancesPerApp;
00280                         
00281                         /** Whether the maxInstancesPerApp option was explicitly specified in
00282                          * this server config. */
00283                         bool maxInstancesPerAppSpecified;
00284                         
00285                         /** The maximum number of seconds that an application may be
00286                          * idle before it gets terminated. */
00287                         unsigned int poolIdleTime;
00288                         
00289                         /** Whether the poolIdleTime option was explicitly specified in
00290                          * this server config. */
00291                         bool poolIdleTimeSpecified;
00292                         
00293                         /** Whether user switching support is enabled. */
00294                         bool userSwitching;
00295                         
00296                         /** Whether the userSwitching option was explicitly specified in
00297                          * this server config. */
00298                         bool userSwitchingSpecified;
00299 
00300                         /** The user that applications must run as if user switching
00301                          * fails or is disabled. NULL means the option is not specified.
00302                          */
00303                         const char *defaultUser;
00304                         
00305                         /** The temp directory that Passenger should use. NULL
00306                          * means unspecified.
00307                          */
00308                         const char *tempDir;
00309                         
00310                         const char *getDefaultUser() const {
00311                                 if (defaultUser != NULL) {
00312                                         return defaultUser;
00313                                 } else {
00314                                         return "nobody";
00315                                 }
00316                         }
00317                         
00318                         const char *getTempDir() const {
00319                                 if (tempDir != NULL) {
00320                                         return tempDir;
00321                                 } else {
00322                                         return getSystemTempDir();
00323                                 }
00324                         }
00325                 };
00326         }

00329 #endif

00331 /** Configuration hook for per-directory configuration structure creation. */
00332 void *passenger_config_create_dir(apr_pool_t *p, char *dirspec);
00333 
00334 /** Configuration hook for per-directory configuration structure merging. */
00335 void *passenger_config_merge_dir(apr_pool_t *p, void *basev, void *addv);
00336 
00337 /** Configuration hook for per-server configuration structure creation. */
00338 void *passenger_config_create_server(apr_pool_t *p, server_rec *s);
00339 
00340 /** Configuration hook for per-server configuration structure merging. */
00341 void *passenger_config_merge_server(apr_pool_t *p, void *basev, void *overridesv);
00342 
00343 void passenger_config_merge_all_servers(apr_pool_t *pool, server_rec *main_server);
00344 
00345 /** Apache module commands array. */
00346 extern const command_rec passenger_commands[];

00349         }
